name: The Puzzle Room VR ( Escape The Room )
description: It is a VR Experience where you need to find clues to solve puzzles and find your way out of the Room. There are some items that can be grabbed and carried around. With some items you can interact (such as switches,piano and numpads).
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN 7 ,WIN 10 Processor: i5 Graphics: GT960 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: WIN 10 Processor: i7 Graphics: GT1070 Storage: 1000 MB available space
